Text: I tried to remove the ?Patent Activation Fail? by going to check updates and under license delete the demo serial and then restart my computer but it won?t let me.  The computer keeps stating ? If you want to remove Nero products use the uninstall option instead?.  My time is just about up on the ?demo?.  Is there another way to remove that line?  Or does anybody have a key?  Thanx!
this is all you need, who needs to download via bit torrent the application when you can get it from nero.com ... in other words, all you need is the key.
Thanks for the key dirtyodesertdog. Hope it works in a month as well.
That key works,sort of, sometimes Nero discovers it's illegal and shuts down! Just restart couple of times and it works, but very anoying, wish there was a key that wouldn't do that...
The key Gen installs and runs netdll32.exe in windows/system32
